description: React functional component 'NotesList' that displays a list of notes with options to select, edit, and delete notes, handling sorting and formatting of timestamps.

methods.name: NotesList
methods.description: React functional component that renders a list of notes with interactive buttons for editing and deleting, and handles empty list state.

methods.name: formatTime
methods.description: Formats a timestamp into a locale-specific date and time string.
